name: Perspective Shift (Bonnem)
description:
Perspective Shift

Change perspective to find hidden keys throughout the world.  When you find what you're looking for, pull out your camera, frame your subject, and CLICK!  Sometimes, all you need is a change in perspective.

Music: 

Alone Once Again (Daniel Birch)
